runas-software.title: Desarrollador de software y Co-fundador
runas-software.description: I'm currently working at Runas Software as a side project. I work on the front end, using technologies like React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I also work on the back end, using technologies like Laravel and Node.js.

universidad-nacional-del-comahue.title: Desarrollador full-stack
universidad-nacional-del-comahue.description: While studying for my bachelor's in software and web development, I developed and maintained web applications for my university career. I worked on the front and back end, using technologies like React, Laravel, and MySQL.
